Name: Eternal Phoenix
Story Background: Born from the flames of the eternal cycle, the Eternal Phoenix is a magnificent symbol of rebirth and resilience. Its fiery form signifies the unyielding spirit and enduring vitality of those who rise from the ashes.
Ability: Flying, When Eternal Phoenix dies, if it didn't have a feather counter on it, return it to the battlefield with a feather counter on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.
Appearance Description: The Eternal Phoenix is a majestic bird engulfed in vibrant, ever-burning flames that illuminate the surrounding skies. Its radiant plumage ignites with hues of crimson and gold, and its piercing eyes exude an unquenchable determination and unyielding spirit.
